thread.title: Burlington Pulls Ivanka’s Merchandise From Online Store
thread.title_full: Burlington Pulls Ivanka’s Merchandise From Online Store

author: Kim Smith
title: Burlington Pulls Ivanka’s Merchandise From Online Store
text:
HSN Inc. stopped selling Trump Home products, but reportedly still sells Trump presidential memorabilia. Sears Holdings removed 31 Trump Home items from its online products. 
It was not immediately known if Burlington will sell Ivanka’s brand in stores. 
Neither Burlington nor Ivanka Trump’s representatives were available for comment.   
It’s pretty obvious at this point that any retailer jumping in on the movement to drop Trump’s line is doing so because of politics. 
They might be thinking the move could be good for a little publicity, but what it ultimately boils down to is how liberals across the country still haven’t accepted that fact that Donald Trump won the presidency. Democrats are still angry because they suffered a historic defeat in November, and will do anything they can to hurt Trump or his family. 
Sadly, this kind of reaction represents just how childish Democrats can be. And let’s face it, lashing out at a member of Trump’s family for no other reason than the fact that he or she is related to someone you don’t like, is about as childish as it gets. 
Maybe someone should tell them Ivanka Trump isn’t the president of the U.S.
